Non-skid footplates with heel loops Seat belt included for added safety Removable footrests Locking rear wheels Padded upholstery and armrests Quick release fold-down back Fixed full-length arms Lightweight aluminum frame (19lb.) makes loading easier Features Nova Medical Products Manufacturer 327R Manufacturer SKU These Nova Ortho Med Nova 327B/ 327R/ 329B/ 329R/ 329BK/ transport chairs are designed to provide easy, lightweight patient transport. The quick-release, fold-down back allows the chair to fit compactly into small areas. The comfortable padded uphosltery and arm pads are reinforced to prevent stretching or ripping. All Nova Ortho Med chairs have removable swing-away footrests and a limited lifetime warranty on the frame. Footrests and seat belt included for all Ortho-Med transport chairs.
